alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:22AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Pushmataha, southeastern Latimer and central Le Flore Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 622 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Talimena State Park to near Snow. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Clayton... Talihina... Wister... Howe... Fanshawe... Cameron... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Talimena State Park... Snow... Bengal... Tuskahoma... Lake Wister State Park... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Summerfield... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
